/* DepositController.getChainDepoStatus */ SELECT T1.CHAIN_NO AS chain_no , T1.CHAIN_NM AS chain_nm , T1.ABANK_CD AS abank_cd , IFNULL(T2.CHAIN_AMT, 0) AS chain_depo_amt , IFNULL(T3.CREDIT_AMT, 0) AS credit_depo_amt , CASE WHEN T1.ABANK_CD = '039' THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(T2.CHAIN_AMT, 0) - IFNULL(T3.CREDIT_AMT, 0) END AS gap_amt , IFNULL(T4.CRD_REMIT_FEE_AMT, 0) AS crd_remit_fee_amt , IFNULL(T4.CRD_UNREMIT_SUB_AMT, 0) AS crd_unremit_sub_amt , IFNULL(T5.CRD_EXC_AMT, 0) AS crd_exc_amt , ( IFNULL(T2.CHAIN_AMT, 0) - IFNULL(T3.CREDIT_AMT, 0)) - IFNULL(T4.CRD_REMIT_FEE_AMT, 0) - IFNULL(T4.CRD_UNREMIT_SUB_AMT, 0) + IFNULL(T5.CRD_EXC_AMT, 0) AS proc_amt FROM TB_CHAIN T1 STRAIGHT_JOIN ( SELECT CHAIN_NO , BANK_IN_DATE, SUM(IN_AMT) CHAIN_AMT FROM TB_CHAIN_DEPOSIT_LIST WHERE BANK_IN_DATE = #{sch_depo_date} AND CHAIN_NO = #{sch_chain_no} GROUP BY CHAIN_NO , BANK_IN_DATE ) T2 ON T2.CHAIN_NO = T1.CHAIN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TRANS_COMP AS CHAIN_NO , BANK_IN_DATE , SUM(IN_AMT) CREDIT_AMT FROM TB_CREDIT_DEPOSIT_LIST WHERE BANK_IN_DATE = #{sch_depo_date} AND TRANS_COMP = #{sch_chain_no} GROUP BY TRANS_COMP, BANK_IN_DATE ) T3 ON T3.CHAIN_NO = T2.CHAIN_NO AND T3.BANK_IN_DATE = T2.BANK_IN_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CHAIN_NO, REG_DATE , SUM(CASE WHEN SUB_CODE = 'I06001' THEN OCCUR_AMT ELSE NULL END) CRD_REMIT_FEE_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN SUB_CODE = 'I07001' THEN OCCUR_AMT ELSE NULL END) CRD_UNREMIT_SUB_AMT FROM TB_SUB_MST WHERE SUB_CODE IN ('I06001', 'I07001') AND CHAIN_NO = #{sch_chain_no} AND REG_DATE = #{sch_depo_date} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND SHIFT_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY CHAIN_NO, REG_DATE ) T4 ON T4.CHAIN_NO = T2.CHAIN_NO AND T4.REG_DATE = T2.BANK_IN_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CHAIN_NO, EXC_DATE, SUM(OCCUR_AMT) CRD_EXC_AMT FROM TB_EXCEED_MST WHERE EXC_CODE = 'I05001' AND CHAIN_NO = #{sch_chain_no} AND EXC_DATE = #{sch_depo_date} AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY CHAIN_NO, EXC_DATE ) T5 ON T5.CHAIN_NO = T2.CHAIN_NO AND T5.EXC_DATE = T2.BANK_IN_DATE WHERE T2.CHAIN_NO = #{sch_chain_no} AND T2.BANK_IN_DATE = #{sch_depo_date}
